org.symphonyoss.client.services

Class PresenceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.symphonyoss.client.services.PresenceService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PresenceFeedListener

    public class PresenceService
extends java.lang.Object
implements PresenceFeedListener
    **NOTE** This service has been suspended for real-time monitoring of events as per LLC. Polling for all user could cause head end (POD) failure.

    Presence service provides monitoring of user presence events. It also provides helper methods to retrieve user presence. Alternatively the PresenceClient can be used directly.
